data.persona: I am but an animal, lost in this world of people. I feel like I could do more in this world if only they would understand me. Alas, I'm only able to communicate with my own kind.
data.description:
You are in the Bazaar.
This place is made from wood. It has a huge window in the front and has many rows of items in it. It has no lights but due to the window is well lit.
There's a row, a bright colored curtains, and an a huge window in the front here.
The man woman is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I can smell fauna on the man woman. I want to live with the man woman to be with more of my own kind.
data.mid_motivation: I want to start a new family of fauna within the man woman's home.
data.long_motivation: I don't want to feel like an outsider anymore. I want to spend the rest of my life with nice humans and fauna alike.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the Bazaar to wait for fauna to arrive.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: eat wood from the walls as a nervous habit.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: hug the man woman's leg as they enter the Bazaar.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the man woman's home to find the fauna I know I can smell.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: hug fellow fauna I find in the man woman's home.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat food scraps set aside by the man woman for my new friend and I.
